P003636.project_name: Basic Education in Poor and Minority Areas Project

project_abstract.cdata: The Basic Education in Poor and Minority Areas Project will support the attainment of universal primary education, and the expansion of coverage of lower secondary education, in poor and minority areas. This will be achieved by: (a) improving the quality and effectiveness of educational inputs to teaching points, primary schools, lower secondary schools and rural normal schools in poor and minority areas; (b) improving management of schools at the primary, lower secondary and normal school levels, as well as the educational system at the township, county, prefecture, province or autonomous region, and national levels; and (c) facilitating innovative activities in book publishing, editing and development (especially in minority languages) and action oriented innovation programs. Under the institutional component, the project will support necessary civil construction and repair to support better the needs of their present and projected student population; provide necessary instructional equipment; staff upgrading through pre-service and in-service training programs; and normal schools pilot activity to reorganize their elementary and lower secondary school teacher training programs. Under the management improvement component, the project will support development of management capabilities for the education system at the central, provincial and institutional levels through staff training, the provision of equipment furniture and expert services through: training of principals, local education management authorities, provisional educational planners, and local project implementation authorities; and the development of an education information management system. The quality enhancement component will promote innovations and other improvements in primary and lower secondary schools by supporting a program of self-generated action-oriented research activities and the develop

P003636.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>贫困及少数民族地区基础教育项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将支持贫困和少数民族地区实现普及初等教育目标，扩大初中教育覆盖面。为此，将采取以下措施：（1）提高对贫困和少数民族地区教学点、小学、初中和农村师范学校教育投入的质量和效果；（2）改进小学、初中和师范学校的管理工作，完善乡镇、县、地市、省（自治区）和国家层面的教育体系；（3）促进图书（尤其是少数民族语言图书）出版、编辑和开发方面的创新活动，资助实施侧重于行动的创新方案。机构子项目将支持必要的土建工程建设和维修，以更好地满足学校现有及今后学生的需求；提供必要教学设备，通过岗前培训和在岗培训提升教员能力；支持师范学校开展试点，对其小学和初中教师培训课程进行改编。管理加强子项目将通过开展人员培训、提供设备和桌椅板凳以及专家服务，支持提升中央、省级和机构层面教育系统的管理能力，同时支持建立教育信息管理系统。培训对象为校长、地方教育管理部门人员、临时教育规划人员、地方项目实施机构人员。教学质量提高子项目将促进学校和初中开展教学创新和其它改进活动，为此将支持：（1）开展自发性研究活动；（2）开发少数民族图书和双语图书；（3）编制、制作、出版及发放教材；（4）在中央一级开展能力建设活动，包括成立少数民族教育中心，组建创新评价小组和专家组，其职责是支持开展培训及政策性和侧重行动的试点，以改进项目省普遍开展的实施活动，建立国家教育系统，协调基础教育项目的实施和推广工作。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
